import pandas as pd 
import datetime
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
from pyspark.sql.types import *
import pyspark.sql.functions as sf
from datetime import datetime 
from datetime import date 
from datetime import timedelta
# from pyspark.sql.functions import to_date
from datetime import time
import pytz
from pathlib import Path
import pymsteams

Tags = pd.read_csv("abfss://repono@ayanadatalake.dfs.core.windows.net/Phelan/staticfilespowerbi_phelan/Tags_Phelan.csv", encoding = 'Latin1')

df_spark = spark.createDataFrame(Tags)
spark.sql("create database if not exists phelan")
df_spark.write.format("delta").mode("append").saveAsTable("phelan.TAGS")

inv = pd.read_csv("abfss://repono@ayanadatalake.dfs.core.windows.net/Phelan/staticfilespowerbi_phelan/AxonPhelan_Inverter.csv")

df_spark = spark.createDataFrame(inv)
spark.sql("create database if not exists phelan")
df_spark.write.format("delta").mode("append").saveAsTable("phelan.Inverter_TABLE2")

pvsyst = pd.read_csv("abfss://repono@ayanadatalake.dfs.core.windows.net/Phelan/staticfilespowerbi_phelan/AxonPhelan_PVSyst.csv")

df_spark = spark.createDataFrame(pvsyst)
spark.sql("create database if not exists phelan")
df_spark.write.format("delta").mode("append").saveAsTable("phelan.PVSystData")
